title: Middle East
content:
just a question do you people think that there will ever be peace in the middle east, i think no, anyway it's doesn't hurt to have a poll & see what people think

vote & make yourself heard

title: Yes:
content:
I think so; I mean... During the U.S. Revolutionary war, we were not at peace, but we made it there.

But in the true sense of the word; I don't think there will be world peace, until their is forgiveness. You can't be at peace with a brother whome you do not forgive.

-- NAJAWA --
[hr]
Answer to KR's post:
[hr]
Hehehe; very good point... but nevertheless!!! Peace will come sometime in the future (Oil is a non-renewable form of energy - sometime in the near future they'll run out). Though... then they may be mad at us!!! :flinchkeen (Man!!! We need an emmotakeen of keen flinching; I really could use one like that!!!)

-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: Yes:
content: Probably not for as long as USA still needs oil.Eat your veggies!

title: Re: Yes:
content:
1.) Define peace

2.) Nowhere is there absolute peace, especially in Americia

3.) Americia and oil are not the only factors in the middle east. When the oil runs out, then we'll see some wars. [Ecconomies collapse, countries invading to aquire more oil to sell to americia, etc]

4.) Come on, their main religion is as divided as catholics and protestants, and they've been fighting in Ireland for years. Not until either Islam is destroyed, moderated, or one sect wipes out all the others will there be peace.

title: Spanish Inquisition:
content:
The Spanish Inquisition was not started by the church, but by Spain; the King and Queen just used us to tell weither or not the person ws in herisy; we did not perscribe the punishment, and we were forced to do it by the geovernment, under penalty of death.
